featuresGrid.title: Complete
featuresGrid.subtitle: Everything to manage suppliers, workers, and documentation with security and efficiency — from office to jobsite.

features.f1Desc: Complete qualification process with automatic mandatory document checklist: company registration, federal/state/municipal tax clearances, FGTS compliance, labor clearance, articles of incorporation, business license, and professional registration.
features.f2Desc: Centralized control of all supplier and worker documentation. Complete history, versioning, and traceability for every document received.
features.f3Desc: Worker entry and exit management with biometric validation. Automatic access block when documentation is irregular or expired.
features.f4Desc: Automatic validation of FGTS (CRF), INSS (GPS), GFIP/SEFIP, payroll, and other labor obligations. Continuous compliance monitoring.
features.f5Desc: Validation of health certificates (NR-7), NR-18 (Construction), NR-35 (Height Work), NR-10 (Electrical), NR-33 (Confined Spaces), PCMSO, and PGR certificates.
features.f6Desc: PPE record management (NR-6) with delivery validation, signature, and approval certificate. Replacement alerts for wear or expiration.
features.f7Desc: Automatic notifications 30, 15, and 7 days before each document expires. Escalation to managers when the supplier doesn't regularize on time.
features.f8Desc: Self-service environment via web and app (GD4 Obra) for suppliers to submit documents, track qualification status, and receive real-time feedback.
features.f9Desc: Consolidated compliance view by project, supplier, and document type. Risk score, compliance indicators, and exportable management reports.
features.f10Desc: 21 specialized AI agents automatically validate each document: company registration, tax clearances, health certificates, safety certs, technical registrations, payroll reports, invoices. From hours to minutes.
